channel.title: CVE Feed for ray-project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ray-project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6020|2024-08-02T08:21:17.152Z -- ray-project -- ray-project%2Fray
item.description: LFI in Ray's /static/ directory allows attackers to read any file on the server without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-6019|2024-08-02T08:21:17.025Z -- ray-project -- ray-project%2Fray
item.description: A command injection existed in Ray's cpu_profile URL parameter allowing attackers to execute os commands on the system running the ray dashboard remotely without authentication. The issue is fixed in version 2.8.1+. Ray maintainers' response can be found here: https://www.anyscale.com/blog/update-on-ray-cves-cve-2023-6019-cve-2023-6020-cve-2023-6021-cve-2023-48022-cve-2023-48023

item.title: CVE-2023-6021|2024-08-02T08:21:16.940Z -- ray-project -- ray-project%2Fray
item.description: LFI in Ray's log API endpoint allows attackers to read any file on the server without authentication. The issue is fixed in version 2.8.1+. Ray maintainers' response can be found here: https://www.anyscale.com/blog/update-on-ray-cves-cve-2023-6019-cve-2023-6020-cve-2023-6021-cve-2023-48022-cve-2023-48023
